steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'References' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Citations & Bibliography' group, click on the 'Bibliography' button.
From the drop-down menu, select the desired bibliography style (e.g., APA, MLA, Chicago).
Place the cursor at the location in the document where you want to insert the bibliography.
Click on the 'Bibliography' button again and select 'Insert Bibliography'.
The bibliography will be inserted at the cursor position in the document.
